name: Project Wasteland
detailed_description: In Project Wasteland, you are a hired mercenary arriving in the wastelands in a teleporter. It is up to you to aid your employer, a slightly crazy AI that will give you bounties that will require you to tangle with the inhabitants of the wastelands! Shoot and loot your way through some mutated baddies PvE content in this third person shooter, but watch out for other players who may have you as their bounty via the PvP systems! Learn about this world through hidden audio logs containing snippets of things that have happened that led to the wastelands odd condition. Test your grit as a mercenary today!

short_description: You are a mercenary who must loot and shoot enemy monsters and sometimes other players! Defeat all the creatures, find all the secret events, and listen out for the lore of the lands! Or enjoy the simple Deathmatch and Battle Royale Modes!
